question: In the written form of many languages, an indentation is an empty space at the beginning of a line to signal the start of a new paragraph. Many computer languages have adopted this technique to designate 'paragraphs' or other logical blocks in the program.
Example
while(true) {
//this is the indented code
So what is indentation?
options: An empty space at the beginning of a line
An empty space at the end of a line
